The player must disguise themselves as one of these guards to get into the fortress during the Black Knights' Fortress quest. They are unaggressive unlike the Black Knights found near them.

Monster ID4772

Fortress Guards are found only at the Black Knights' Fortress. They wear black cloaks and resemble generic town guards, and have various weapons such as swords, spears, and halberds which can hit different amounts at different speeds. The player must disguise themselves as one of these guards to get into the fortress during the Black Knights' Fortress quest. They are unaggressive unlike the Black Knights found near them.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • They appear to be holding shields along with spears and halberds which are both two-handed weapons.
  • The original Fortress Guard, removed in 2006, is still present in the game files.

They wear black cloaks and resemble generic town [[guard]]s, and have various [[weapons]] such as [[sword]]s, [[spear]]s, and [[halberd]]s which can hit different amounts at different [[Monster attack speed|speeds]]. The player must disguise themselves as one of these guards to get into the fortress during the [[Black Knights' Fortress]] [[Quests|quest]].
